Combatant of the Black Irem Brigade - Boots (Replica/Men)

Black Irem Brigade Boots (Replica, M)
Male01_Feet_bi_soldier_Re_description

A pair of boots worn by combatants in the Black Irem Brigade. The initial order requested for the boots to be designed to allow the wearer to move in complete silence, but the project manager ended up forgetting to convey that detail to the development team, and the BIB ended up with what amounted to a completely ordinary pair of boots.[#Legal]

Une paire de bottes portée par les combattants de la Brigade Noire Irem. La requête initiale était de créer des bottes permettant au sujet de se déplacer dans un silence total, mais le chef de projet a oublié de transmettre ce détail à l'équipe des développeurs, et les bottes Brigade ont fini comme des bottes ordinaires. [#Legal]

Ein Paar Stiefel, die von den Kämpfern der Black Irem Brigade getragen werden. Die ursprüngliche Anfrage für die Stiefel lautete, dass diese den Träger lautlos schreiten lassen sollten. Leider vergaß der Projektverantwortliche, dieses kleine Detail an das Entwicklungsteam weiterzuleiten und die BIB erhielt somit lediglich ein Paar ganz gewöhnliche Stiefel.[#Legal]

Stivali calzati dai combattenti della Brigata Black Irem. L'ordine prevedeva inizialmente un prodotto in grado di far camminare senza fare il minimo rumore, dettaglio che però il manager del progetto dimenticò di comunicare al team incaricato di svilupparli, con il risultato che le Brigate si ritrovarono a calzare stivali assolutamente normalissimi.[#Legal]

Unas botas utilizadas por los combatientes del Escuadrón Irem Negro. El objetivo primario de las botas fue que su diseño permitiera a su portador moverse en absoluto silencio, el jefe de proyecto olvidó transmitir ese detalle al equipo de desarrollo, y el Escuadrón Irem Negro acabó disponiendo de un par de botas absolutamente normales y corrientes.[#Legal]
ブラックアイレム団の戦闘員たちが履いているブーツ。足音を立てずに歩けるよう、製造する業者に発注していたが、業者側の担当者が製造部門にそのことを伝え忘れており、結局消音効果は実装されなかった。[#Legal]
블랙 아이렘단의 전투원들이 신고 있는 부츠. 발소리를 내지 않고 걸을 수 있도록 제작을 요청했지만, 업자측 담당자가 깜빡 잊고 제조부서에 그 사실을 전달하지 않아서, 결국 소음효과는 장착되지 않았다.[#Legal]

The boots worn by Combatants of the Black Irem Brigade. They were supposed to be made specially as to mute the sound of footsteps, but the makers forgot about that part, and they don't actually mute the sound at all.[#Legal]
黑色Irem團的戰鬥員們所穿的靴子。為了讓走路沒有腳步聲，特別向製造業者訂購。但業者的負責人忘了傳達給製造部門，結果實際上並沒有靜音的效果。[#Legal]
黑色Irem團的戰鬥員們所穿的靴子。為了讓走路沒有腳步聲，特別向製造業者訂購。但業者的負責人忘了傳達給製造部門，結果實際上並沒有靜音的效果。[#Legal]

A pair of boots worn by combatants in the Black Irem Brigade. The initial order requested for the boots to be designed to allow the wearer to move in complete silence, but the project manager ended up forgetting to convey that detail to the development team, and the BIB ended up with what amounted to a completely ordinary pair of boots.[#Legal]
